formattedAddress: 235 W 135th St, New York, NY 10030, USA

originalText.text: Dr Valmond is one of the best doctors I’ve ever been to. In fact, I’ve been a patient of his since 2007/8. I have followed him to the different facilities he’s worked and I am so glad he has opened his own practice. Dr V is intelligent, caring, respectful, AND he listens to you! I cannot express how important that is in today’s age. He’s an awesome human being. You will not regret making an appointment to see him.

originalText.text: Dr. Valmond is an amazing Doctor with a great bedside manner. He listens thoroughly and goes the extra mile to help you. Its a very busy office so give yourself time its not an in and out office.

text.text: Dr. Valmond is an amazing Doctor with a great bedside manner. He listens thoroughly and goes the extra mile to help you. Its a very busy office so give yourself time its not an in and out office.

originalText.text:
Dr. Valmond is one of the most intelligent doctors I have met. He takes the the time to REALLY listen to his patients. His bedside manner is that of honesty and kindness.
I really feel like I’m his only patient when I have an appointment.

His staff are very nice and the office is run in a very professional manner.

originalText.text: Almost all of the staff here are super helpful. As a walk in patient the wait time is super long .. definitely better to schedule a appointment

originalText.text: Dr. Valmond is an amazing Doctor who really takes care of his patients. I have been a patient of his for 20 plus years! He is truly is  God Sent to help keep his patients well!
